did.abstract: Working from her Woodbridge, CT, home, Lucille B. Ritvo has been active in the state's political arena for decades. She chaired the Caucus of Connecticut Democrats, representing the liberal wing of the party in the early 1980s. She has worked in many political campaigns and chaired Joe Duffy's 1970 senatorial campaign (CT, 3rd District).

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Working from her Woodbridge, CT, home, Lucille B. Ritvo has been active in the state's political arena for decades. She chaired the Caucus of Connecticut Democrats, representing the liberal wing of the party in the early 1980s. She has worked in many political campaigns and chaired Joe Duffy's 1970 senatorial campaign (CT, 3rd District).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection is comprised of materials relating to Ritvo's work on several campaigns and includes correspondence, printed materials, campaign instructions, and clippings. The collection also contains a folder of membership lists and printed materials of the Caucus of Connecticut Democrats, as well as a biographical clipping.
Additional materials were donated in 2002 have not yet been incorporated into the collection.
